articles.title: Your Social Security COLA increase could be smaller than expected next year - Fox Business
articles.description: Social Security beneficiaries could receive a 3% cost-of-living adjustment in 2025, according to a new analysis, as inflation shows signs of moderating.
articles.content:
Social Security recipients are on track to receive a cost-of-living adjustment (COLA) next year that is smaller than previously expected after inflation moderated more than expected in May.
